name: fiori3
description: A program to demonstrate the use of TypeScript with openUI5

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run karma
scripts.karma: rimraf coverage && start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:8080 karma-ci
scripts.karmalocal: rimraf coverage && start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:8080 karma-local
scripts.build-ui: rimraf dist && tsc --build tsconfig.json && ui5 build --a
scripts.build-ui-dev: rimraf dist && tsc --build tsconfig.json && ui5 build dev --a --dev-exclude-project=sap.ui.core sap.m sap.f sap.ui.layout sap.uxap themelib_sap_belize themelib_sap_fiori_3
scripts.build-sc: rimraf dist && tsc --build tsconfig.json && ui5 build self-contained --all --dest=dist
scripts.package-cf: npm run build-ui && cp cf_deployment_resources/package.json dist/package.json && cp cf_deployment_resources/xs-app.json dist/xs-app.json && mbt init && make -f Makefile.mta p=cf
scripts.deploy-cf: npm run package-cf && cross-var cf deploy mta_archives/TsApp_$npm_package_version.mtar
